meanings.definition: A valuable object that has belonged to a family for several generations.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's heirloom necklace is passed down to me.
meanings.sent2: The antique clock in our living room is a cherished family heirloom.
meanings.sent3: We always joke that the heirloom teapot brings luck to whoever drinks from it.
meanings.sent4: The heirloom ring symbolizes the enduring bond between our family members.
meanings.sent5: The heirloom quilt holds the stories of our ancestors within its threads.

meanings.definition: Something of special value handed down from one generation to another.
meanings.sent1: The heirloom recipe for apple pie has been in our family for years.
meanings.sent2: The heirloom watch was a gift from my great-grandfather.
meanings.sent3: We consider our family dog an heirloom of love and loyalty.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an heirloom passed down through the generations.
meanings.sent5: The heirloom vase is a reminder of the love shared by our ancestors.
